metadata.synopsis: Dialog featuring a goblin and half-orc. Triggers the start of the caravan escort with the Drider appearing.The Drider is male, half-drow elf and half spider (bottom half). He carries a magical lantern to ward off the shadows
metadata.how_to_trigger: - go to Region: SCL -> Mountain Pass- set Act 2 Absolute Path- goto 92.91, 51.44, -50.63- talk to Kansif, perform the Lyre- talk to Drider

122.speaker: Kar'niss
122.text: Apart from a torturer of lyres.
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: The drider scuttles closer to players, looming over them as their minds meld.

49.speaker: Kansif
49.text: More faithful of the Absolute. They need a guide to the Tower, same as us.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The drider scuttles closer to players, looming over them as their minds meld.

124.speaker: Narrator
124.text: *Your minds connect and you hear a whispered voice. The Absolute? Or just the echoes of his fractured mind, reverberating in the dark?*
124.context: CinematicNodeContext: The drider scuttles closer to players, looming over them as their minds meld.

121.text: A True Soul. You have more worshippers every day, majesty.
121.context:
CinematicNodeContext: He lowers his face to look the players in the eyes before the line.

Scuttles back to standard distance at the end of the line.NodeContext: He lowers his face to look the players in the eyes. Stress on 'nicely'

130.speaker: Kar'niss
130.text: A True Soul. You have more worshippers every day, majesty.
130.context:
CinematicNodeContext: He lowers his face to look the players in the eyes before the line.

Scuttles back to standard distance at the end of the line.NodeContext: He lowers his face to look the players in the eyes. Stress on 'nicely'

82.speaker: Kar'niss
82.context:
CinematicNodeContext: He lowers his face to look the players in the eyes before the line.

Scuttles back to standard distance at the end of the line.NodeContext: He lowers his face to look the players in the eyes. Stress on 'nicely'

15.speaker: Player
15.text: Every step into the darkness leads us away from the crèche. Cleansing awaits - do not lose sight of our prize.
15.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

117.speaker: Lae'zel
117.text: Every step into the darkness leads us away from the crèche. Cleansing awaits - do not lose sight of our prize.
117.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

8.speaker: Lae'zel
8.text: Every step into the darkness leads us away from the crèche. Do not lose sight of our prize.
8.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

10.speaker: Player
10.text: It's time to leave. Take me to Moonrise.
10.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

152.text: It's time to leave. Take me to Moonrise.
152.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

60.speaker: Player
60.text: It's time to leave. Take me to Moonrise.
60.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

134.speaker: Player
134.text: So you're the guide? How do you survive out there?
134.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

79.speaker: Kar'niss
79.text: We have our queen's favour. She speaks to us. Protects us. Graces us with Her blessing.

154.speaker: Player
154.text: Why do I need you to get to Moonrise? What's out there?
154.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

145.speaker: Player
145.text: I'll get to Moonrise myself. A few shadows don't scare me.
145.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

32.speaker: Player
32.text: I'm not following this damned creature - it's an insult to my Queen!
32.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

31.speaker: Kar'niss
31.text: Their queen?! They still follow the spider bitch?
31.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

115.speaker: Player
115.text: Forgive me, obviously I'm loyal to the Absolute.
115.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

67.speaker: Player
67.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

110.speaker: Player
110.text: I follow Lolth almighty, and how dare you reject our Dark Mother.
110.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

64.speaker: Kar'niss
64.context: NodeContext: Realising you're a traitor and don't believe in his god. Next line is "Treachery! Heathens!"

136.speaker: Player
136.text: My, what a delightful abomination you are.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: I'm not following that abomination anywhere.

133.speaker: Brawler Vez
133.text: Try not to piss him off, mate...

87.speaker: Kar'niss
87.text: To insult me is to insult Her Majesty. It is to mock the Absolute!
87.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

167.speaker: Player
167.text: It's a compliment! You're a beautiful beast. Calm down.
167.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

120.speaker: Player
120.text: Forgive me, I would never insult the Absolute.
120.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

55.speaker: Kar'niss
55.text: Do not! It is only Her mercy that keeps us safe in the darkness.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Worshipping the Absolute doesn't stop me finding you disgusting to look at.
69.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Worshipping the Absolute doesn't mean I have to accept freaks like you.
35.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

74.speaker: Brawler Vez
74.text: Easy now, we're all on the same side, right?
74.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

155.speaker: Kar'niss
155.text: My queen has ordered me to guide Her followers through the dark. However imperfect they may be.
155.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

26.speaker: Player
26.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

5.speaker: Player
5.text: My apologies. I'm loyal to the Absolute, always.
5.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

43.speaker: Kar'niss
43.text: Good. It is only Her mercy that keeps us safe in the darkness.
43.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

90.speaker: Brawler Vez
90.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

62.speaker: Kar'niss
62.text: They are jealous of Your gift, Majesty. But You gave it to us. And we always keep it close.
62.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Why? What's hiding in the dark?
38.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

66.speaker: Player
66.text: I don't need you to keep me safe out there.
66.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

105.speaker: Player
105.text: Can I examine your lantern? Surely the Absolute wouldn't mind?
105.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

13.speaker: Kar'niss
13.text: No! Our queen gave it to us.
13.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

30.speaker: Kar'niss
30.text: If they wish to walk through the darkness alone, they are welcome to.
30.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Why are you smiling like that? What's out there?
1.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

158.speaker: Brawler Vez
158.text: Oh ho, the drow really told you nothin', eh?
158.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

111.speaker: Brawler Vez
111.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

86.speaker: Kansif
86.text: No more 'demonstrations'. Time is short, we need to go.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin picks up a bone, gets the attention of a nearby hyena, and then throws the bone into the shadows. The hyena chases after it, disappearing into the dark. In the darkness, shadowy tendrils grab the animal. It's dragged  away yelping, until it's silenced with a *crunch*.

127.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin picks up a bone, gets the attention of a nearby hyena, and then throws the bone into the shadows. The hyena chases after it, disappearing into the dark. In the darkness, shadowy tendrils grab the animal. It's dragged  away yelping, until it's silenced with a *crunch*.

22.speaker: Kar'niss
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider attacks goblin in a frenzy

33.speaker: Brawler Vez
33.text: Don't worry, we didn't need that 'un anyway.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider attacks goblin in a frenzy

103.speaker: Kar'niss
103.text: No no NO! We do not toy with the dark. WE DO NOT FEED THE SHADOWS!
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider attacks goblin in a frenzy

95.speaker: Player
95.text: Admire the grace of the Drider's serrated legs.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider relents, stops hitting the goblin

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Stop ogling the butcher: save the goblin.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider relents, stops hitting the goblin

46.speaker: Player
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider relents, stops hitting the goblin

106.speaker: Narrator
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider relents, stops hitting the goblin

138.speaker: Kar'niss
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider relents, stops hitting the goblin

57.speaker: Kar'niss
57.text: We do not toy with the dark. None of us! Do they understand?
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider steps away, the goblin is alive and getting up.

80.speaker: Kansif
80.text: We understand. Now, we need to go.
80.context: NodeContext: Stressing 'we need to go' - you're in a rush, but can't order this guy around.

50.speaker: Kar'niss
50.text: Yes. Yes, we shall go. Your light leads the way, my Queen. Are all ready?

19.speaker: Kar'niss
19.text: Bless us again, Majesty. Shine Your light, protect us.

6.speaker: Kar'niss
6.text: Come. Follow and stay close. Do not leave the light. Do not feed the shadows.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yelled at the camp in generalNodeContext: Calling to the goblins around him

0.speaker: Kansif
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yelled at the camp in generalNodeContext: Calling to the goblins around him

97.speaker: Player
97.text: That was amazing... Let's travel together.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: I'll find another way to Moonrise.

109.speaker: Kar'niss
109.text: Die alone, then. We do not care.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: You go ahead. I need to consider my options.

85.speaker: Kar'niss
85.text: Come. Do not leave the light. Do not feed the shadows.

146.speaker: Player
146.text: What the hells is hiding in there?

93.speaker: Kar'niss
93.text: Things best avoided. Shadows lurking in shadows.

139.speaker: Kar'niss
139.text: Now, will they follow or stay?

4.text: *You might as well give orders to an avalanche - the drider does not relent.*
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Goblin has been beaten to death

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *You might as well give orders to an avalanche - the drider does not relent.*
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Goblin has been beaten to death

119.speaker: Kar'niss
119.text: We do not toy with the dark! Do they understand?
119.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider steps away, the goblin is deadNodeContext: Panting. You just beat someone to death.

142.speaker: Player
142.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player pulls the goblin away from the drider's attackNodeContext: Recovering from the drider's attack

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: Gods above, what's wrong with you?!
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player pulls the goblin away from the drider's attackNodeContext: Recovering from the drider's attack

165.speaker: Brawler Vez
165.text: Gods above, what's wrong with you?!
165.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player pulls the goblin away from the drider's attackNodeContext: Recovering from the drider's attack

108.text: *You try to pull the goblin away, but it's too late. She's gone.*
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Goblin has been beaten to death

160.speaker: Narrator
160.text: *You try to pull the goblin away, but it's too late. She's gone.*
160.context: CinematicNodeContext: Goblin has been beaten to death

65.speaker: Player
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider steps away, but the goblin is deadNodeContext: Shouting to stop someone from beating someone else to death.

27.speaker: Kansif
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider steps away, but the goblin is deadNodeContext: Shouting to stop someone from beating someone else to death.

161.speaker: Player
161.text: Fine. I don't need you or your lamp.
161.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

147.speaker: Brawler Vez
147.text: That so? Maybe this'll change your mind.
147.context: NodeContext: Wants to demonstrate something gross to the player (killing a worg)

58.speaker: Player
58.text: I apologise, I didn't mean any offence.

63.speaker: Kansif
63.text: Good. Now, are we ready to depart?

104.speaker: Kansif
104.text: Peace! We have enemies enough out there.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: I need to do something first. You wait here.

11.speaker: Kar'niss
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: He lowers his face to look the players in the eyesNodeContext: He lowers his face to look the players in the eyes. Stress on 'nicely'

94.speaker: Kansif
94.text: More faithful of the Absolute. They need a guide to the Tower, same as us.

135.speaker: Kar'niss
135.text: Are they ready, majesty? Shall we depart?
135.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider arrives to find the camp deserted apart from you and some dead goblins.InternalNodeContext: Drider arrives to find the camp has been slaughteredNodeContext: Looking around at dead goblins - his allies have been slaughtered

153.speaker: Kar'niss
153.text: Your worshippers, Majesty. What happened here?
153.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider arrives to find the camp deserted apart from you and some dead goblins.InternalNodeContext: Drider arrives to find the camp has been slaughteredNodeContext: Looking around at dead goblins - his allies have been slaughtered

56.speaker: Kar'niss
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turns and looks at the player with malevolenceNodeContext: Turns and looks at the player with malevolence

100.speaker: Player
100.text: I just found them like this.

116.text: At least these have survived. At least we return with some faithful.

91.speaker: Kar'niss
91.text: At least these have survived. At least we return with some faithful.

17.speaker: Kar'niss
17.text: But we should depart. Are they ready to leave?
17.context: NodeContext: Looks out to the dark, then back to players

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Every step into the darkness leads us away from the crèche. Cleansing awaits - do not lose sight of our prize.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider stares at the moon lantern while delivering line.

53.speaker: Lae'zel
53.text: Every step into the darkness leads us away from the crèche. Cleansing awaits - do not lose sight of our prize.
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider stares at the moon lantern while delivering line.

34.speaker: Player
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider stares at the moon lantern while delivering line.

3.speaker: Player
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider stares at the moon lantern while delivering line.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: First tell me how you can move safely through the darkness.
114.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider stares at the moon lantern while delivering line.

9.speaker: Kar'niss
9.text: We walk in the Absolute's light. Her blessed power keeps the shadows back.
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drider stares at the moon lantern while delivering line.

102.speaker: Kar'niss
102.text: But the shadows are cunning. Wily. If you stray from the light even for a moment, they'll have you.

75.speaker: Player
75.text: What's out there? What makes the shadows so dangerous?

51.speaker: Kar'niss
51.text: Hungry shades and cursed darkness. Cursed by a lesser god, but dangerous all the same, oh yes.

112.speaker: Kar'niss
112.text: Our queen's light will keep them at bay. Will keep us safe as we guide Her faithful to Her temple, but only if they stay close.

101.speaker: Kar'niss
101.text: So why are we still waiting, Majesty? Why have we not left?

162.speaker: Kar'niss
162.text: They must follow close, Majesty. They must not leave the light.

107.speaker: Player
107.text: I need to do something first. You wait here.

72.speaker: Kar'niss
72.text: We will wait for a time, Majesty, but not long. The shadows are getting closer - we cannot wait long.

125.speaker: Lae'zel
125.text: Every step into the darkness leads us away from the crèche. Do not lose sight of our prize.

157.speaker: Player
157.text: I don't know. I was fast asleep, resting for the journey!
157.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to 'god' rather than the playerNodeContext: rejoicing

128.speaker: Player
128.text: I killed them in the Absolute's name, now take me to Moonrise or meet the same fate.
128.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to 'god' rather than the playerNodeContext: rejoicing

140.speaker: Kar'niss
140.text: They culled the weakest of your flock in your name, Majesty. Glorious!
140.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to 'god' rather than the playerNodeContext: rejoicing

118.speaker: Kar'niss
118.text: They culled the weakest of your flock in your name, Majesty. Glorious!
118.context: CinematicNodeContext: speaking to 'god' rather than the playerNodeContext: rejoicing

42.text: They think they can lie to us, Majesty, but we know better.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Preparing to attack the playerNodeContext: About to attack the player

21.speaker: Kar'niss
21.text: They think they can lie to us, Majesty, but we know better.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Preparing to attack the playerNodeContext: About to attack the player

44.speaker: Kar'niss
44.text: They will pay for this. They will die for this!
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Preparing to attack the playerNodeContext: About to attack the player

150.speaker: Player
150.text: I slaughtered them, like I'm going to slaughter you.
150.context: CinematicNodeContext: Makes a move to stop the players from leaving before going into combat

73.speaker: Player
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Makes a move to stop the players from leaving before going into combat

47.speaker: Kar'niss
47.text: No, they will not leave! They will answer for their crimes!
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Makes a move to stop the players from leaving before going into combat
